id.description: Identifier string used for the collection, no catalog should repeat the id used

title.description: Title added to catalog file, shown by STAC clients

description.description: Description added to catalog file. Markdown may be used for rich text representation.

endpoint.description: Expected url where catalog will be deployed

raw_url.description: Base URL for raw story markdown files. Example https://raw.githubusercontent.com/username/repo/main/stories

rendered_url.description: Base URL for rendered stories with {id} template. Example https://dashboard_url/story?id={id}

stories_endpoint.description: Expected urls where stories are deployed and hosted

assets_endpoint.description: Url base path to where locations will be deployed

collections.description: List of collections and indicators that will be part of the catalog, have to match file names of collections and indicators configured in the collections and indicators folders (without the extension)

default_base_layers.description: Optional relative path to baselayer definition file. Example: layers/baselayers.json

default_overlay_layers.description: Optional relative path to overlay definition file. Example: layers/overlays.json
